set(LIBHTTP_PARSER_SOURCES
  http-parser/http_parser.c
)
add_library(http-parser OBJECT ${LIBHTTP_PARSER_SOURCES})
set_target_properties(http-parser PROPERTIES
  POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
